page.title: 13MY HOUSE
page.content: My house is on the border between Lancashire and Yorkshire,between Colne and Lothersdale.Our house has 17 rooms. Three years ago we had an extension built,but as we have a wood which blocks out the sunlight behind our house,our lounge is upstairs.Our lounge is 22ft. by 18ft.In the games room which is above the garage,there is a snooker table and a dart-board. The bedrooms and bathroom are downstairs.In the older part a glass door has a heron which has been sand-blasted into the glass.In the dining-room round the solid oak table are red-leather chairs with brass studs round the edges.Our kitchen is large with numerous cupboards.
